activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Lee Clay III

records.addlTxt: Calendar call on January 19, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Activity: Preliminary hearing and Arraignment
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

10:16 AM Defendant Robert Lee Clay III appeared by video.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy appeared by video for Robert Lee Clay III.  Attorney Richard Jay Sullivan appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant's attorney, reading waived. Defendant's attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set. Bond to continue.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Preliminary hearing on October 4, 2022 at 10:15 am.

10:13 AM  Defendant Robert Lee Clay III appeared by video.  Attorney Michael Shannon Murphy appeared by video for Robert Lee Clay III.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom, waiving time limits.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Adjourned initial appearance on September 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

10:26 AM Defendant Robert Lee Clay III appeared by video. Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Matter continued for public defender to appoint counsel. Bond to continue.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Adjourned initial appearance on September 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:38 PM Defendant Robert Lee Clay III appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Ryan W O'Hara appeared by video for Robert Lee Clay III.  Prosecuting attorney David S Olson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Court orders $500 Signature bond with conditions:  No contact with First National Bank and Salam and Shah Dental Group. Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 10:00 AM.
